text: Ete ache suspasta nidarsanabali -- makkame ibrahima; ara ye ke'u ekhane prabesa karabe se hacche nirapada, ara allahâ€Œra uddesye e'i grhe haja kara manabagosthira jan'ya abasyika -- yara'i sekhanakara patheya arjanera ksamata ache. Ara ye abisbasa posana kare -- tahale nihsandeha allah samasta srsta jagatera theke sbayam-sampurna.
